backend/main.mo: Defines a canister with user profile storage and authorization checks for viewing and updating profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings and component dependencies for implemented chat-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining color palettes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile loading, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/chat/AttachmentP: Renders previews for image, audio, or file attachments with remove‑attachment actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/CameraCaptu: Modal dialog for capturing or selecting an image using camera or file input, handling preview, retake, and submission.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Chat input component supporting text, image/file attachments, camera capture, and voice recording before sending messages.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders chat messages with support for displaying image, audio, and file attachments along with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/chat/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for chat messages and attachments.
frontend/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx: Chat UI container with message list, auto‑scroll, and message composer.
frontend/src/components/CommentsDialog.t: Empty file placeholder for a comments dialog component.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileDialo: Empty file placeholder for a profile editing dialog component.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, bottom navigation, and tab‑based routing between feed, chat, and profile.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a post card component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their display name on first login.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSession.ts: Manages chat messages persisted in sessionStorage with helpers to add or clear messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Handles microphone recording with timers, error handling, and returns the final audio blob.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode plus global styles and scrollbar tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a styled login screen using Internet Identity with social links and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Displays the ChatWindow component inside a flexible layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile info with Internet Identity data and provides a logout action.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics/formatErr: Converts unknown errors into concise readable strings with optional stack trimming.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics/stepLogge: Provides timestamped logging helpers for step-based debugging with success and error variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color bindings to CSS variables, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and versioning for build planning metadata.
